column5: I have just read that  Hammercarp has passed away. Any one who knew Lorne would tell you he was an outstanding individual who loved the outdoors, and our sport in particular. He will surely be missed.

That is sad news, I meet Lorne a few times at the Waterfront Trust kids fishing day,  he had a both set up. Saw it in the Spec but thought it was someone else. https://www.thespec.com/announcements-obituaries-memorials/obituaries-death-notices/8339025-morley-lorne-patrick/
Sorry to hear this...Lorne was a ardent member of The Carp Anglers Group
For those that knew him (I didn't), I saw this on Facebook and don't want to post a direct link. Hopefully these screenshots help you find it. Condolences to all involved.
64 is too young to go.  Sad news.
